lift_raw: Statistically significant 11% decrease in churn for perk blast group, repull on 1/6/2025 found still significant 2.94% reduction in cancellations. NOTE: Email Blast = PERKS_BLAST in current system. Current blasts have no control groups since everyone receives them.
results_snippet:
* Control Group: 19,360, Total Cancels: 860, Cancel Rate: 4.44%
* Test Group: 19,134, Total Cancels: 759, Cancel Rate: 3.97%

lift_raw: Not significant, 5.4% improvement in cancel rate. HISTORICAL DATA: Golden Day 12 showed 11% churn reduction at 3 months, 7% at 6 months, 2.9% at 11 months. Replaced by PERKS_BLAST strategy.
results_snippet:
* Control Group: 8047, Total Cancels: 802, Cancel Rate: 9.97%
* Test Group: 7,903, Total Cancels: 745, Cancel rate: 9.43%

lift_raw: If we assume dog and cat owners are equally swayed by perks, the implied lift is 5.3%
